metadata.name: Quest Generator
metadata.description: Task-specific prompt for generating quest content. Can be used as: (1) System instructions for a specialized Quest Design Agent, or (2) Offline world-building tool for creating quest hooks and storylines.
metadata.author: The Shifting Atlas Team

usagePatterns: Offline content creation workflow (not real-time gameplay)
Direct LLM call via backend handler for quest seeds
usage.interpolation: Variables replaced before sending to LLM or injected as conversation context
usage.notes: Quest generation is typically an offline/planning activity, not real-time player interaction

template:
Create a [quest_type] for [location/faction].
Difficulty: [player_level_range]
Integration: [current_storylines], [faction_conflicts]
Include: multiple_solutions, skill_check_variety, lore_references
